channel.title: Silabsoft client error wen connecting
channel.description: ok well everytime i go to log in with silabsoft on sum1 elses server (that needs silab client) it comes up with error connecting to server, then i check it with moparscape 3.2 w aryan and its works fine, so wats wrong with my silab client, can any1 tell me please would be much appreciated thnx

item.title: Silabsoft client error wen connecting
item.dc:creator: @Baybee Baybee
item.description:
@Baybee wrote:

[quote=“the master of pk, post:10, topic:151126”]i tried lyk 5 diff servers that u MUST use silabsoft client with, plus about 15 - 20 that dont need silabsoft client still comes up with “Error Connecting To Server”, but it works if i host a server, so im prettymuch stuck on this 1 =$.’

EDIT: ill try the online one ill edit again if no1 posts in time

EDIT2: ok well the online client works fine kk so dont worry no more =P[/quote]

Lol and download the latest version of Silabs v.4.

Read full topic

item.title: Silabsoft client error wen connecting
item.dc:creator: @Baybee Baybee
item.description:
@Baybee wrote:

Go to Control Panel > Performance and Maintanence > System > Advanced > Environment Variables.

Bottom white box seach for " PATH ".
Edit it and paste this. C:\Program Files\PC Connectivity Solution\;%SystemRoot%\system32;%SystemRoot%;%SystemRoot%\sy stem32\WBEM;C:\Program Files\Intel\DMIX;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin.
Then click ok and close.
Now try running Silabs Client.

Hope that helped.

Read full topic
